Product details:
Enjoy comfort from the first wear with our Men's Washed Broadcloth Short Sleeve Shirt. Using cotton grown in Africa by small farming communities, the fabric undergoes a special washing process to ensure a worn-in feel from the start.
Available in a variety of colors and patterns to match any occasion or mood, this is the perfect every day shirt for the warmer season. You can style it unbuttoned over a t-shirt or button up and wear it on its own.
